title: Pannier rack
content: The minimalist pannier rack is ideal for fixing panniers weighing up to 5 kg each. The rear and brake lights are unobtrusively integrated into it. The “Form follows function” design principle has been exceptionally well executed with the pannier rack

warnings: Format mismatch: Missing card-info container, Missing "More Information" button
Minor format differences: Missing border-radius styling, Missing box-shadow styling
